resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104312</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104312</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206286</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sun-Earth Day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne-Masse Tag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jour de la Soleil-Terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia Da Sol-Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giorno Della Sole-Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήλιος-γη ημέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Día De la Sol-Tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a series of programs that culminates with a celebration of the spring equinox. Eclipse: In a Different Light, this year's theme, shows how eclipses have inspired people to study the sun-earth-moon system. Join this journey of exploration and discovery in preparation for a total solar eclipse.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Reihe Programme, die mit einer Feier des 
Frühling Äquinoktikums kulminiert. Eklipse: In einem 
anderen Licht zeigt diesjähriges Thema, wie Eklipsen Leute angespornt
haben, das Sonne-Masse-Mond System zu studieren. Verbinden Sie 
diese Reise der Erforschung und der Entdeckung in der Vorbereitung 
für eine Gesamtsolareklipse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une série de programmes qui culmine avec une 
célébration de l'équinoxe de ressort. Éclipse : Dans 
une lumière différente, le thème de cette année, montre comment 
les éclipses ont inspiré des personnes étudier le système de 
soleil-terre-lune. Joignez ce voyage d'exploration et de 
découverte en vue d'une éclipse solaire totale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma série dos programas que culmine com um 
celebration do equinócio da mola. Eclipse: Em uma luz 
diferente, o tema deste ano, mostra como os eclipses inspiraram povos 
estudar o sistema da sol-terra-lua. Junte esta viagem da 
exploração e da descoberta na preparação para um eclipse solar 
total.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una serie di programmi che culmina con una 
celebrazione dell'equinozio della molla. Eclipse: In una 
luce differente, il tema relativo a quest'anno, mostra come le eclipse
hanno ispirato la gente studiare il sistema della sole-terra-luna. 
Unisca questo viaggio di esplorazione e della scoperta in 
preparazione per un'eclipse solare totale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια σειρά προγραμμάτων που καταλήγει με έναν 
εορτασμό του ελατηρίου equinox. Έκλειψη: Σε ένα 
διαφορετικό ελαφρύ, φετινό θέμα, επιδεικνύει πώς οι εκλείψεις 
έχουν εμπνεύσει τους ανθρώπους για να μελετήσουν το σύστημα 
ήλιος-γη-φεγγαριών. Ενώστε αυτό το ταξίδι της εξερεύνησης 
και της ανακάλυψης σε προετοιμασία για μια συνολική ηλιακή 
έκλειψη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una serie de programas que culmina con una 
celebración del equinoccio del resorte. Eclipse: En una 
diversa luz, el tema relativo a este año, muestra cómo los eclipses 
han inspirado a gente que estudie el sistema de la sol-tierra-luna. 
Ensamble este viaje de la exploración y del descubrimiento en 
la preparación para un eclipse solar total.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206286</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104312</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/sun-earth-day</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
